page.title: 04230ACRE MIXED FARM,ST.ALLEN.
page.content: Lanner Barton has South Devon herd of 150 beef cattle,50 suckler cows & 100 breeding Border Leicester xDevon Long_ wool ewes with 2 working dogs.The 230 acres include 6\ acres oak coppice & 7 acres wet moorland.Modern sheds around the yard give night & winter accom.for cattle,& hay storage.Farm policy is self_supporting.70acres spring dredge_ corn (oats+barley) & 40 acres hay(5500 bales)are grown,milled,consumed on the farm.Some compound feed is bought.A closed flock policy(only bull &ram are bought_in) with suckler cows producing calves for beef,& enough ewe_lambs kept to replenish the flock,means no incoming diseases.A 70_hour week,or daylight hours,is usual for Mr.Gay who with his wife,son,& a part_time worker from Trispen,works the farm without contractors.
